verses.verse: Israel <S%H3478><s%> is a <S%H1238>luxuriant<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%>, that putteth <S%H7737>forth<s%> his <S%H6529>fruit<s%>: according to the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of his <S%H6529>fruit<s%> he hath <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> his <S%H4196>altars<s%>; according to the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> of their <S%H776>land<s%> they have made <S%H2895>goodly<s%> <S%H4676>pillars<s%>.

Their <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H2505>divided<s%>; now shall they be found <S%H816>guilty<s%>: he will <S%H6202>smite<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%>, he will <S%H7703>destroy<s%> their <S%H4676>pillars<s%>.
Surely now shall they <S%H559>say<s%>, We have no <S%H4428>king<s%>; for we <S%H3372>fear<s%> not <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and the <S%H4428>king<s%>, what can he do for <S%H6213>us<s%>?

They <S%H1696>speak<s%> vain <S%H1697>words<s%>, <S%H422>swearing<s%> <S%H7723>falsely<s%> in <S%H3772>making<s%> <S%H1285>covenants<s%>: therefore <S%H4941>judgment<s%> springeth <S%H6524>up<s%> as <S%H7219>hemlock<s%> in the <S%H8525>furrows<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

The <S%H7934>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall be in <S%H1481>terror<s%> for the <S%H5697>calves<s%> of <S%H1007>Beth-aven<s%>; for the <S%H5971>people<s%> thereof shall <S%H56>mourn<s%> over <S%H3649>it<s%>, and the priests thereof that <S%H1523>rejoiced<s%> over <S%H3519>it<s%>, for the glory <S%H1540>thereof<s%>, because it is departed from it.

It also shall be <S%H2986>carried<s%> unto <S%H804>Assyria<s%> for a <S%H4503>present<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3377>Jareb<s%>: <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H1317>shame<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of his own <S%H6098>counsel<s%>.
As for <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, her <S%H4428>king<s%> is cut <S%H1820>off<s%>, as <S%H7110>foam<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%>.

The high <S%H1116>places<s%> also of <S%H206>Aven<s%>, the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%>: the <S%H6975>thorn<s%> and the <S%H1863>thistle<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> on their <S%H4196>altars<s%>; and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, <S%H3680>Cover<s%> <S%H1389>us<s%>; and to the hills, Fall on <S%H5307>us<s%>.

O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, thou hast <S%H2398>sinned<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>: there they <S%H5975>stood<s%>; the <S%H4421>battle<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5932>iniquity<s%> doth not <S%H5381>overtake<s%> them in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>.

When it is my <S%H185>desire<s%>, I will <S%H3256>chastise<s%> <S%H5971>them<s%>; and the peoples shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> against <S%H631>them<s%>, when they are bound to their <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5869>transgressions<s%>.

And <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is a <S%H5697>heifer<s%> that is <S%H3925>taught<s%>, that <S%H157>loveth<s%> to tread <S%H1758>out<s%> the <S%H5674>grain<s%>; but I have passed over upon her <S%H2898>fair<s%> <S%H6677>neck<s%>: I will set a <S%H7392>rider<s%> on <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>; <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H2790>plow<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall break his <S%H7702>clods<s%>.

Sow <S%H2232><s%> to yourselves <S%H6310>in<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, <S%H7114>reap<s%> according to <S%H2617>kindness<s%>; break <S%H5214>up<s%> your fallow <S%H5215>ground<s%>; for it is <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, till he <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3384>rain<s%> righteousness upon <S%H6664>you<s%>.

Ye have <S%H2790>plowed<s%> <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>, ye have <S%H7114>reaped<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>; ye have <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of <S%H3585>lies<s%>; for thou didst <S%H982>trust<s%> in thy <S%H1870>way<s%>, in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>.

Therefore shall a <S%H7588>tumult<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%> among thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, and all thy <S%H4013>fortresses<s%> shall be <S%H7703>destroyed<s%>, as <S%H8020>Shalman<s%> <S%H7701>destroyed<s%> <S%H1009>Beth-arbel<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4421>battle<s%>: the <S%H517>mother<s%> was dashed in <S%H7376>pieces<s%> with her <S%H1121>children<s%>.

So <S%H3602><s%> shall <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto you <S%H6440>because<s%> of your <S%H7451>great<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>: at <S%H7837>daybreak<s%> shall the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H1820>utterly<s%> cut <S%H1820>off<s%>.
